meanings.meaning: thinking that sth good will happen

examples: I feel quite hopeful that a peaceful solution will be found.
Don't get too hopeful. We may not be able to go.
The police remained hopeful that she would be found alive.
Only Janet, eternally hopeful, thought it was worth trying again.
She was not very hopeful about her situation.
The police are quite hopeful of catching the thieves.

meanings.meaning: making you think that sth good will happen

examples: Things aren't looking very hopeful at the moment.
There are some fairly hopeful signs of recovery in the US market.
